title: Mini-Ep 155: Feeling Blue (Tansy)
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 155: Feeling Blue (Tansy)
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree let their thoughts percolate around coffee-drinking routines and do a Blue Tansy Deep Dive. Plus, they hear from listeners about what to gift teachers and a possible Vintner’s Daughters dupe. Activity of the Day: Watch the Ha...
description:
Kate and Doree let their thoughts percolate around coffee-drinking routines and do a Blue Tansy Deep Dive. Plus, they hear from listeners about what to gift teachers and a possible Vintner’s Daughters dupe.


 Activity of the Day: Watch the Happiest Season trailer! (It co-stars past F35 guest Mary Holland, who also co-wrote it.)


Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show. We're doing Office Hours! Click here for info.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.
  • HAWTHORNE - Find the perfect gift this holiday season by visiting Hawthorne.CO/GIFT! 
  • BRUUSH - Get an exclusive 25% off everything store-wide during the Pre-Black Friday sale today through November 22 when you use promo code FOREVER35-25 at bruush.com.
  • STITCH FIX - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box.
  • CONAIR - Try the Turbo Extreme Steam Handheld Steamer!To buy go to conair.com and search Turbo Extreme Steam.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
